name: Party Heist
description:
What this game is about?

This is a small fast turn-based murder-sniper-party local and not only this multiplayer game (what a mouthful!). If you didnt see games like this before, there comes:

EXPLANATION

There a two teams - spy in totally unsuspecting crowd, and a dude with the gun:

 wins when he collects a needed amount of poorly drawn diamonds 
wins when he finds    among crowd and kindly asks him to not collect poorly drawn diamonds   

GAMEPLAY (how to play this masterpiece)

if i could show gameplay in 5 seconds it would be this:

But let me explain:

1. Adjust options as you want and click on Start Game:

attention: amount of players is actually amount of spy's, i forgor to change that
Recommended options:
1 spy: 1/1/4
2-3 spy's: 2-3/2/6
4 spy's: 4/2/7

2. Press CTRL to show seed/room-codes:

Each room has its number, that changes every game
Ask your friends to take a shot/screenshot of it, if they playing as spys. Make sure to not look at codes if you a playing as sniper:

3. Ask them to choose starting room. 

Starting with first spy, he needs to say number of the room he wants to start in. Click on the corresponding chip at the bottom:

After that PLAYER 0 at the left corner will change to PLAYER 1. It means starting position has been saved, and now its time to choose starting position for the next spy.

When everyone is ready, press space - its time for a real game...

4. Real game

Spys take turns in the same order when you was choosing starting position.
In each turn they say number of room they want to move in.
Similarly to starting position, click on the chip below to confirm that.

To end turn, press space or wait until timer on top reaches 0
When every spy take their turn, everyone (including bots) moves, and everything repeats:

spy in example above is blue

We see that spy actually touched some diamond ! When everyone moves again, gem will be automatically collected, and a new diamond  will be spawned:

After some time sniper detects this sussy activity. He presses S to pull up his gun and shoots reckless spy with left click:

do not die if you playing as spy - you will die

Well, it looks like spy's having a bad time there, thats why I decided to add some spice: Yeah boi, thats ITEMS. One of them will be spawned randomly, and after you collect it, it got automatically used similarly to diamonds .
  • Badass smoke covers half of the area and gives you ability to be unspotted when you do your crazy things for a decent amount of time
  • Loud music will add 3 another dudes to area, so you can better hide among crowd
  • Hack disables light in the facility for 1 full turn, so you can do anything you want
  • Safe spawns 3 diamonds  in random rooms, so you can end game earlier
  • Costume change changes appearance of ALL dudes in area, so sniper cant count only on his memory
Using all of this stuff, we get fast spy-sniper madness.

P.S. don't take this game as a super serious project - it's just a game to laugh with friends if you have nothing to do for the next half hour. Ive done it in less than 3 days, so if there problems with balance or something like that - let me know. I dont know if this game will receive any updates BUT if you really want them - you know what to do. I read absolutely all comments and even write back! (Not that I have a lot of them actually). Peace <3
